CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 28, 1961, pg. A10 reads: "Charming Hostesses - Saturday Card Club members gave a gay bridge-luncheon last Saturday at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton, and entertained some 20 tables of exquisitely gowned guests. Members are, seated: Mmes. Marjorie Harris, Betty Butler, president, and Jewel Blow.  Standing: Mmes. Carolyn Stevenson, Florida M. Brown, Daisy E. Lampkin, Agatha Sims, Jessie M. Vann, Esther Bolden, Ada Rickmond and Kathleen Douglass. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eleven members of the Saturday Card Club, left to right, seated; Marjorie Harris, Betty Butler, and Jewel Blow. Standing; Carolyn Stevenson, Florida M. Brown, Daisy E. Lampkin, Agatha Sims, Jessie M. Vann, Esther Bolden, Ada Rickmond and Kathleen Douglass, gathered around square table with four place settings, in ithe Hotel Penn-Sheraton for bridge-luncheon, another version
